item.dc:creator: @Miss_Doctor Miss_Doctor
item.description:
@Miss_Doctor wrote:

Explain please, I’m just learning Java…umm. :S What do you mean what void?

public void NewObjects()					 {

That? And executed…? OHH! Do you mean:

case 8987:
if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) {
if(actionTimer == 0)
{
teleportToX = 2923;
teleportToY = 9803;
sendMessage(“You jump through the portal to the Dragon Cave training area.”);
}
}
break;

case 7353:
if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) {
if(actionTimer == 0)
{
teleportToX = 2923;
teleportToY = 9803;
sendMessage(“You jump through the portal to the Lesser Arena.”);
}
}
break;

What do you mean??? Lol…Executed the void ? But…the void for is for all the objects in my server…is that a problem? Is that what’s making them not work? Um…confused :S

item.title: In need of help ASAP! Please no flaming....seriously =l
item.dc:creator: @Miss_Doctor Miss_Doctor
item.description:
@Miss_Doctor wrote:

Okay, this is really strange. I’ve been trying to make portals…and all this strange stuff keeps happening. They either don’t work…or they start duplicating themselves or they dissapear. Wtf ? Here is my code for the 2 potals I have. Tell me if there’s anything wrong in it that’s making them do this (Now they wont show up at all.)

In client.java I have:

case 8987:
if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) {
if(actionTimer == 0)
{
teleportToX = 2923;
teleportToY = 9803;
sendMessage(“You jump through the portal to the Dragon Cave training area.”);
}
}
break;

case 7353:
if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) {
if(actionTimer == 0)
{
teleportToX = 2923;
teleportToY = 9803;
sendMessage(“You jump through the portal to the Lesser Arena.”);
}
}
break;

Those are both of the portals. Here’s the other part of the code. (the object thing)

	makeGlobalObject(2610, 3089, 8987, 0, 10);//Yanille D. Cave Portal
	makeGlobalObject(2610, 3096, 7353, 0, 10);//Yanille L. Cave Portal

Also…I’ve made a fishing spot…yet when I try to fish nothing happens. What’s wrong with my code?

		case 42:  //Fishing
			addItem(317, 1);
			sendMessage("You catch a shrimp.");
			addSkillXP((1000*playerLevel[10]), 10);
			actionTimer = 10;
			setAnimation(897);
			updateRequired = true;
			appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
			break;
